title: Carousel Cheat
body: I don't believe it is fair that if a bench is full, the carousel champ chosen gets to play right away. I faced a guy that was level 6 the other day and he had 9 champions on the board.

replies.body: Um when this happens to me I can't do anything with the bench or my board. How does that person have 3 extra champs using this method if they can't buy, sell, or combine champs?

> [{quoted}](name=Stephenizgod,realm=NA,application-id=PKbQ4unq,discussion-id=HlO86gK0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-08-04T08:08:34.349+0000)
>
> How does that person have 3 extra champs using this method if they can't buy, sell, or combine champs?

Precisely, it is impossible that a player have 3 more champs

Well...it is somewhat possible. If you manage to get to level 9 (which is rare), you can have 9 champs on the board. You can also combine two spatula's to get a force of nature which allows you to have one extra on the board. So having 9 champs legitally is possible, but when the bench is full, the game just automatically places the champ onto the board which is the biggest problem. Most people by default either sell the champ for the item or switch it out or something like that. What should happen is the champ should be displayed on the board, but grayed out so it can't be used. Basically it will sit there, but it can't perform unless the bench is cleared of a space and the champ automatically moves to the spot.
Unfortunately MOST players use this glitch/cheat and Riot have to take a position on that. Having even one champ more is always a benefit, especially at the beginning.

I don't see it as a very big deal, as soon as you make any change to your bench the(or a different) character moves. And you cannot make any changes to your field while you're above the threshold. Honestly, if someone can actually use this to their advantage, it would be so situational that I would consider it a skill, because the handicap that it causes is massive.

Also, if he was level 6 with 9 champs then he must have had 2 FoN. Unless you're saying that he didn't make any adjustments to his field for 2 whole carousels, and if that's the case, then that guy was already so far ahead that this wouldn't have made any difference.

not a big deal but if you lose a win streak because someone got a free daisy that's not really cool is it?
or just take one more damage and get knocked out, of a RANKED game....

if it is no big deal they should remove ranked play as winning doesn't really matter.

You can't move anyone already on the board at all, and you can't sell or combine any champs.  This locks you in place, and is a severe enough disadvantage that you'll very likely want to break it before very long.

Also, there aren't many other options.  They would have to add an extra spot to the end of the bench specifically for extra carousel champs (which honestly I think is a good idea), but until something like that gets added, it is what it is.
